conversation.name: Willow
conversation.label: Willow:
conversation.phrase: I knew it. I knew it. Well, not "knew it" in the sense of having the slightest idea, but I knew there was something I didn't know. You two were fighting way too much, it's not natural.

conversation.name: Willow
conversation.label: Willow:
conversation.phrase: Weird? It's against all laws of God and man. It's Cordelia. Remember? The We Hate Cordelia club of which you are the treasurer.

conversation.label: Xander:
conversation.phrase: I was going to tell you.
conversation.name: Xander

conversation.label: Willow:
conversation.phrase: Gee, what stopped you, could it be shame?
conversation.name: Willow

conversation-text:
Xander: Willow, come on!
Willow: I knew it. I knew it. Well, not "knew it" in the sense of having the slightest idea, but I knew there was something I didn't know. You two were fighting way too much, it's not natural.
Xander: I know it's weird.
Willow: Weird? It's against all laws of God and man. It's Cordelia. Remember? The We Hate Cordelia club of which you are the treasurer.
Xander: I was going to tell you.
Willow: Gee, what stopped you, could it be shame?
conversation-title: Is there an upper limit to Willow's adorkability? (Buffy S2 E14)
